journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: But for now, a symbolic moment is about to occur.

sentences.english: Already the press of arousal , can not achieve symbolistic earnings only readily.

sentences.english: Critics said that Amanda is the sex symbol of the hard-bodied athletic world.
sentences.chinese: 批评者说，阿曼达是象征性的运动世界的硬体。

sentences.english: Several heads were symbolic of decadence and oppression, and also of heresy.
sentences.chinese: 几个头是象征性的衰落和压迫，和并且异端邪说。

sentences.english: The symbolic  wedding was a celebration of life and friendship.

sentences.english: At first, onychomycosis appears to be only a cosmetic concern.

sentences.english: The power of Mikado in Japan is symbolic .

sentences.english: It cannot be quieted by token moves or talk.
sentences.chinese: 也不能靠象征性的举动或说教将其平息下去。

sentences.english: This isn't the first time an auto executive has volunteered to work for a token salary.
sentences.chinese: 其实，汽车公司老总自愿拿象征性的年薪并非首次。

sentences.english: Raise the feet symbol again to kick to once and perhaps use one a cruel Chuo of the pen my hand up .

sentences.english: It's a cents-off coupon married to a Friday-after-Thanksgiving shopping frenzy.
sentences.chinese: 这是象征性赠券与感恩节周末疯狂购物的一桩联姻。

sentences.english: The president who serves as a ceremonial head of state is elected for a seven-year term.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰的总统为象征性职务，每届任期7年。

sentences.english: Women have not even reached the level of tokenism that blacks are reaching.
sentences.chinese: 妇女甚至还没有达到黑人所达到的象征性的平等水平。
